LightningComponentBundle.description: Display toast notifications in Lightning Experience

property.name: type
property.label: Toast Type
property.description: Type of toast (success, error, warning, info)

property.name: message
property.label: Message
property.description: The message to display in the toast. Use {url} to include a link

property.name: duration
property.label: Duration (seconds)
property.description: How long to show the toast (max 120 seconds)

property.name: key
property.label: Key
property.description: The toast key for grouping similar toasts

property.name: urlLink
property.label: URL
property.description: The URL to use when {url} is in the message

property.name: urlLabel
property.label: URL Label
property.description: The label to show for the URL
